# MAIT

::: img-float
![](img.png){style="float: left; margin: 5px; width: 200px;"}
:::

The MAIT package for analysing LC/MS Metabolomic data, as discussed in a [previous post](http://b2slab.upc.edu/software-and-downloads/metabolite-automatic-identification-toolkit/), was published in a collaboration between the B2SLab and the [Nutrimetabolomics lab](http://www.nutrimetabolomics.com/) in the Oxford Bioinformatics journal:

> [Fernández-Albert F, Llorach R, Andrés-Lacueva C, Perera-Lluna A. *An R package to analyse LC/MS metabolomic data: MAIT (Metabolite Automatic Identification Toolkit)*. Bioinformatics (2014). doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btu136.](http://bioinformatics.oxfordjournals.org/content/early/2014/03/17/bioinformatics.btu136.html)

MAIT package [is now available](http://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/MAIT.html) through the [Bioconductor](http://www.bioconductor.org/) repository. All the upcoming new versions of the MAIT packages will be published in Bioconductor as well.
